PAR::Filter::Obfuscate(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PAR::Filter::Obfuscate(3)

NAME

PAR::Filter::Obfuscate - Obfuscating filter

SYNOPSIS

    PAR::Filter::Obfuscate->apply(\$code); # transforms $code

DESCRIPTION

This filter uses B::Deobfuscate (available separately from CPAN) to turn the script into comment-free, architecture-independent Perl code with mangled variable names.

CAVEATS

A harmless message will be displayed during "pp":

    /tmp/8ycSoLaSI1 syntax OK

Please just ignore it. :-)

SEE ALSO

PAR::Filter, B::Deobfuscate, PAR::Filter::Crypto
